name: seisplotjs
description: Javascript library for parsing, manipulating and displaying seismic data.

scripts.compile: npm run build:clean && npm run rollup && npm run flow-copy && npm run standalone
scripts.browserify: browserify src/index.js --ignore-missing --standalone seisplotjs -o dist/seisplotjs_${npm_package_version}_standalone.js  -t [ babelify ] && npm run example_standalone && npm run tutorial_standalone
scripts.tutorial_standalone: cd docs/tutorial ; rm seisplotjs_*_standalone.js ; ln -s ../../dist/seisplotjs_${npm_package_version}_standalone.js ;  cd ../..
scripts.example_standalone: cd docs/examples; cd helicorder ; rm seisplotjs_*_standalone.js ; ln -s ../../../dist/seisplotjs_${npm_package_version}_standalone.js ; cd ..; cd viewobspy/www;rm seisplotjs_*_standalone.js;ln -s ../../../../dist/seisplotjs_${npm_package_version}_standalone.js; cd ../../../..
scripts.standalone: npm run browserify && npm run tutorial_standalone && npm run example_standalone
scripts.version: npm run compile && npm run standalone && npm run bumpversion && npm run doc
scripts.postversion: echo remember: git push && echo remember: git push --tags
scripts.bumpversion: npm run bumpversion_standalone && npm run bumpversion_version
scripts.bumpversion_standalone: replace-in-file seisplotjs_2.0.1_standalone.js seisplotjs_${npm_package_version}_standalone.js docs/index.html docs/tutorial/*.html docs/examples/*/*.html docs/examples/*/*/*.html examples/*/*.html --verbose
scripts.bumpversion_version: replace-in-file 2.0.1 ${npm_package_version} createApiDocs.sh src/index.js docs/index.html docs/tutorial/*.html docs/examples/*.html docs/examples/*/*.html docs/examples/*/*/*.html --verbose
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run flow && npm run lint && npm run test && npm outdated && git update-index --no-skip-worktree docs/api/*.html  && git diff --exit-code

author: Philip Crotwell <crotwell@seis.sc.edu>
